results.content: I think if we are ready to build a business, we should know by now how to fill in a password. I mean, it's right there telling us what to do at the hosting website. Kind of makes the course go slowly; however, maybe it will come in useful later down the road when we build our Wordpress sites.

results.content: This was the third course I did on udemy on wordpress and it was my favorite one. It covered all the basics and explained every function but it also gave further detail information how to use wordpress. e.g. good plugins and tips for blogging.
results.content_html: This was the third course I did on udemy on wordpress and it was my favorite one. It covered all the basics and explained every function but it also gave further detail information how to use wordpress. e.g. good plugins and tips for blogging.

results.content:
I’m a blogger that is a great fan of the blogger platform. I never needed Wordpress because all I did was writing about my personal thoughts and views. I never needed a professional website. However, in the few months I wanted to take the step further and start earning through a Wordpress website. I found this course on Udemy and I can say that it is great. 
The course contains everything you need to know about setting up and starting a Wordpress website. The course is neatly organized and the trainer obviously has great talent of explaining things. I understood everything perfectly and now my Wordpress website is live. The production quality is good, as this guy is probably an experienced Udemy trainer. Thank you, now many things are clear to me.
results.content_html:
